Section.Catchline: Placing water hyacinths in any of the streams or waters of the state.

SectionBody.Text: Whoever willfully places or causes to be placed any water hyacinths in any of the territorial waters of the state whether navigable or nonnavigable shall be guilty of a misdemeanor of the second degree, punishable as provided in s. 775.082 or s. 775.083.
